activity_state.name: activity_state
activity_state.label: Activity State
activity_state.help_text:
Status based on activities
Overdue: Due date is already passed
Today: Activity date is today
Planned: Future activities.

activity_exception_decoration.name: activity_exception_decoration
activity_exception_decoration.label: Activity Exception Decoration
activity_exception_decoration.help_text: Type of the exception activity on record.

activity_exception_icon.name: activity_exception_icon
activity_exception_icon.label: Icon
activity_exception_icon.help_text: Icon to indicate an exception activity.

message_needaction.name: message_needaction
message_needaction.label: Action Needed
message_needaction.help_text: If checked, new messages require your attention.

message_has_error.name: message_has_error
message_has_error.label: Message Delivery error
message_has_error.help_text: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

message_has_error_counter.name: message_has_error_counter
message_has_error_counter.label: Number of errors
message_has_error_counter.help_text: Number of messages with delivery error

message_has_sms_error.name: message_has_sms_error
message_has_sms_error.label: SMS Delivery error
message_has_sms_error.help_text: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

price_extra.name: price_extra
price_extra.label: Variant Price Extra
price_extra.help_text: This is the sum of the extra price of all attributes

lst_price.name: lst_price
lst_price.label: SalesÂ Price
lst_price.help_text: The sale price is managed from the product template. Click on the 'Configure Variants' button to set the extra attribute prices.

active.name: active
active.label: Active
active.help_text: If unchecked, it will allow you to hide the product without removing it.

barcode.name: barcode
barcode.label: Barcode
barcode.help_text: International Article Number used for product identification.

standard_price.name: standard_price
standard_price.label: Cost
standard_price.help_text:
In Standard Price & AVCO: value of the product (automatically computed in AVCO).
        In FIFO: value of the next unit that will leave the stock (automatically computed).
        Used to value the product when the purchase cost is not known (e.g. inventory adjustment).
        Used to compute margins on sale orders.

packaging_ids.name: packaging_ids
packaging_ids.label: Product Packages
packaging_ids.help_text: Gives the different ways to package the same product.

qty_available.name: qty_available
qty_available.label: Quantity On Hand
qty_available.help_text:
Current quantity of products.
In a context with a single Stock Location, this includes goods stored at this Location, or any of its children.
In a context with a single Warehouse, this includes goods stored in the Stock Location of this Warehouse, or any of its children.
stored in the Stock Location of the Warehouse of this Shop, or any of its children.
Otherwise, this includes goods stored in any Stock Location with 'internal' type.

virtual_available.name: virtual_available
virtual_available.label: Forecasted Quantity
virtual_available.help_text:
Forecast quantity (computed as Quantity On Hand - Outgoing + Incoming)
In a context with a single Stock Location, this includes goods stored in this location, or any of its children.
In a context with a single Warehouse, this includes goods stored in the Stock Location of this Warehouse, or any of its children.
Otherwise, this includes goods stored in any Stock Location with 'internal' type.

free_qty.name: free_qty
free_qty.label: Free To Use Quantity
free_qty.help_text:
Forecast quantity (computed as Quantity On Hand - reserved quantity)
In a context with a single Stock Location, this includes goods stored in this location, or any of its children.
In a context with a single Warehouse, this includes goods stored in the Stock Location of this Warehouse, or any of its children.
Otherwise, this includes goods stored in any Stock Location with 'internal' type.

incoming_qty.name: incoming_qty
incoming_qty.label: Incoming
incoming_qty.help_text:
Quantity of planned incoming products.
In a context with a single Stock Location, this includes goods arriving to this Location, or any of its children.
In a context with a single Warehouse, this includes goods arriving to the Stock Location of this Warehouse, or any of its children.
Otherwise, this includes goods arriving to any Stock Location with 'internal' type.

outgoing_qty.name: outgoing_qty
outgoing_qty.label: Outgoing
outgoing_qty.help_text:
Quantity of planned outgoing products.
In a context with a single Stock Location, this includes goods leaving this Location, or any of its children.
In a context with a single Warehouse, this includes goods leaving the Stock Location of this Warehouse, or any of its children.
Otherwise, this includes goods leaving any Stock Location with 'internal' type.

nbr_moves_in.name: nbr_moves_in
nbr_moves_in.label: Nbr Moves In
nbr_moves_in.help_text: Number of incoming stock moves in the past 12 months

nbr_moves_out.name: nbr_moves_out
nbr_moves_out.label: Nbr Moves Out
nbr_moves_out.help_text: Number of outgoing stock moves in the past 12 months

show_on_hand_qty_status_button.name: show_on_hand_qty_status_button
show_on_hand_qty_status_button.label: Show On Hand Qty Status Button

company_currency_id.name: company_currency_id
company_currency_id.label: Valuation Currency
company_currency_id.help_text: Technical field to correctly show the currently selected company's currency that corresponds to the totaled value of the product's valuation layers

valuation.name: valuation
valuation.label: Inventory Valuation
valuation.help_text:
Manual: The accounting entries to value the inventory are not posted automatically.
        Automated: An accounting entry is automatically created to value the inventory when a product enters or leaves the company.

cost_method.name: cost_method
cost_method.label: Costing Method
cost_method.help_text:
Standard Price: The products are valued at their standard cost defined on the product.
        Average Cost (AVCO): The products are valued at weighted average cost.
        First In First Out (FIFO): The products are valued supposing those that enter the company first will also leave it first.

sequence.name: sequence
sequence.label: Sequence
sequence.help_text: Gives the sequence order when displaying a product list

description_sale.name: description_sale
description_sale.label: Sales Description
description_sale.help_text: A description of the Product that you want to communicate to your customers. This description will be copied to every Sales Order, Delivery Order and Customer Invoice/Credit Note

detailed_type.name: detailed_type
detailed_type.label: Product Type
detailed_type.help_text:
A storable product is a product for which you manage stock. The Inventory app has to be installed.
A consumable product is a product for which stock is not managed.
A service is a non-material product you provide.

list_price.name: list_price
list_price.label: Sales Price
list_price.help_text: Price at which the product is sold to customers.

uom_id.name: uom_id
uom_id.label: Unit of Measure
uom_id.help_text: Default unit of measure used for all stock operations.

uom_po_id.name: uom_po_id
uom_po_id.label: Purchase UoM
uom_po_id.help_text: Default unit of measure used for purchase orders. It must be in the same category as the default unit of measure.

taxes_id.name: taxes_id
taxes_id.label: Customer Taxes
taxes_id.help_text: Default taxes used when selling the product.

supplier_taxes_id.name: supplier_taxes_id
supplier_taxes_id.label: Vendor Taxes
supplier_taxes_id.help_text: Default taxes used when buying the product.

property_account_income_id.name: property_account_income_id
property_account_income_id.label: Income Account
property_account_income_id.help_text: Keep this field empty to use the default value from the product category.

property_account_expense_id.name: property_account_expense_id
property_account_expense_id.label: Expense Account
property_account_expense_id.help_text: Keep this field empty to use the default value from the product category. If anglo-saxon accounting with automated valuation method is configured, the expense account on the product category will be used.

account_tag_ids.name: account_tag_ids
account_tag_ids.label: Account Tags
account_tag_ids.help_text: Tags to be set on the base and tax journal items created for this product.

responsible_id.name: responsible_id
responsible_id.label: Responsible
responsible_id.help_text: This user will be responsible of the next activities related to logistic operations for this product.

property_stock_production.name: property_stock_production
property_stock_production.label: Production Location
property_stock_production.help_text: This stock location will be used, instead of the default one, as the source location for stock moves generated by manufacturing orders.

property_stock_inventory.name: property_stock_inventory
property_stock_inventory.label: Inventory Location
property_stock_inventory.help_text: This stock location will be used, instead of the default one, as the source location for stock moves generated when you do an inventory.

sale_delay.name: sale_delay
sale_delay.label: Customer Lead Time
sale_delay.help_text: Delivery lead time, in days. It's the number of days, promised to the customer, between the confirmation of the sales order and the delivery.

tracking.name: tracking
tracking.label: Tracking
tracking.help_text: Ensure the traceability of a storable product in your warehouse.

has_available_route_ids.name: has_available_route_ids
has_available_route_ids.label: Routes can be selected on this product

route_ids.name: route_ids
route_ids.label: Routes
route_ids.help_text: Depending on the modules installed, this will allow you to define the route of the product: whether it will be bought, manufactured, replenished on order, etc.

use_expiration_date.name: use_expiration_date
use_expiration_date.label: Use Expiration Date
use_expiration_date.help_text: When this box is ticked, you have the possibility to specify dates to manage product expiration, on the product and on the corresponding lot/serial numbers

expiration_time.name: expiration_time
expiration_time.label: Expiration Date
expiration_time.help_text: Number of days after the receipt of the products (from the vendor or in stock after production) after which the goods may become dangerous and must not be consumed. It will be computed on the lot/serial number.

use_time.name: use_time
use_time.label: Best Before Date
use_time.help_text: Number of days before the Expiration Date after which the goods starts deteriorating, without being dangerous yet. It will be computed on the lot/serial number.

removal_time.name: removal_time
removal_time.label: Removal Date
removal_time.help_text: Number of days before the Expiration Date after which the goods should be removed from the stock. It will be computed on the lot/serial number.

alert_time.name: alert_time
alert_time.label: Alert Date
alert_time.help_text: Number of days before the Expiration Date after which an alert should be raised on the lot/serial number. It will be computed on the lot/serial number.

purchase_method.name: purchase_method
purchase_method.label: Control Policy
purchase_method.help_text:
On ordered quantities: Control bills based on ordered quantities.
On received quantities: Control bills based on received quantities.

purchase_line_warn.name: purchase_line_warn
purchase_line_warn.label: Purchase Order Line Warning
purchase_line_warn.help_text: Selecting the "Warning" option will notify user with the message, Selecting "Blocking Message" will throw an exception with the message and block the flow. The Message has to be written in the next field.

available_in_pos.name: available_in_pos
available_in_pos.label: Available in POS
available_in_pos.help_text: Check if you want this product to appear in the Point of Sale.

to_weight.name: to_weight
to_weight.label: To Weigh With Scale
to_weight.help_text: Check if the product should be weighted using the hardware scale integration.

pos_categ_id.name: pos_categ_id
pos_categ_id.label: Point of Sale Category
pos_categ_id.help_text: Category used in the Point of Sale.

service_type.name: service_type
service_type.label: Track Service
service_type.help_text:
Manually set quantities on order: Invoice based on the manually entered quantity, without creating an analytic account.
Timesheets on contract: Invoice based on the tracked hours on the related timesheet.
Create a task and track hours: Create a task on the sales order validation and track the work hours.

sale_line_warn.name: sale_line_warn
sale_line_warn.label: Sales Order Line
sale_line_warn.help_text: Selecting the "Warning" option will notify user with the message, Selecting "Blocking Message" will throw an exception with the message and block the flow. The Message has to be written in the next field.

expense_policy.name: expense_policy
expense_policy.label: Re-Invoice Expenses
expense_policy.help_text: Expenses and vendor bills can be re-invoiced to a customer.With this option, a validated expense can be re-invoice to a customer at its cost or sales price.

invoice_policy.name: invoice_policy
invoice_policy.label: Invoicing Policy
invoice_policy.help_text:
Ordered Quantity: Invoice quantities ordered by the customer.
Delivered Quantity: Invoice quantities delivered to the customer.

property_account_creditor_price_differen.name: property_account_creditor_price_difference
property_account_creditor_price_differen.label: Price Difference Account
property_account_creditor_price_differen.help_text: This account is used in automated inventory valuation to record the price difference between a purchase order and its related vendor bill when validating this vendor bill.

optional_product_ids.name: optional_product_ids
optional_product_ids.label: Optional Products
optional_product_ids.help_text: Optional Products are suggested whenever the customer hits *Add to Cart* (cross-sell strategy, e.g. for computers: warranty, software, etc.).

service_to_purchase.name: service_to_purchase
service_to_purchase.label: Subcontract Service
service_to_purchase.help_text: If ticked, each time you sell this product through a SO, a RfQ is automatically created to buy the product. Tip: don't forget to set a vendor on the product.

landed_cost_ok.name: landed_cost_ok
landed_cost_ok.label: Is a Landed Cost
landed_cost_ok.help_text: Indicates whether the product is a landed cost: when receiving a vendor bill, you can allocate this cost on preceding receipts.

split_method_landed_cost.name: split_method_landed_cost
split_method_landed_cost.label: Default Split Method
split_method_landed_cost.help_text: Default Split Method when used for Landed Cost

product_count.name: product_count
product_count.label: # Products
product_count.help_text: The number of products under this category (Does not consider the children categories)

property_account_income_categ_id.name: property_account_income_categ_id
property_account_income_categ_id.label: Income Account
property_account_income_categ_id.help_text: This account will be used when validating a customer invoice.

property_account_expense_categ_id.name: property_account_expense_categ_id
property_account_expense_categ_id.label: Expense Account
property_account_expense_categ_id.help_text: The expense is accounted for when a vendor bill is validated, except in anglo-saxon accounting with perpetual inventory valuation in which case the expense (Cost of Goods Sold account) is recognized at the customer invoice validation.

removal_strategy_id.name: removal_strategy_id
removal_strategy_id.label: Force Removal Strategy
removal_strategy_id.help_text:
Set a specific removal strategy that will be used regardless of the source location for this product category.

FIFO: products/lots that were stocked first will be moved out first.
LIFO: products/lots that were stocked last will be moved out first.
Closet location: products/lots closest to the target location will be moved out first.
FEFO: products/lots with the closest removal date will be moved out first (the availability of this method depends on the "Expiration Dates" setting).

packaging_reserve_method.name: packaging_reserve_method
packaging_reserve_method.label: Reserve Packagings
packaging_reserve_method.help_text:
Reserve Only Full Packagings: will not reserve partial packagings. If customer orders 2 pallets of 1000 units each and you only have 1600 in stock, then only 1000 will be reserved
Reserve Partial Packagings: allow reserving partial packagings. If customer orders 2 pallets of 1000 units each and you only have 1600 in stock, then 1600 will be reserved

property_valuation.name: property_valuation
property_valuation.label: Inventory Valuation
property_valuation.help_text:
Manual: The accounting entries to value the inventory are not posted automatically.
        Automated: An accounting entry is automatically created to value the inventory when a product enters or leaves the company.

property_cost_method.name: property_cost_method
property_cost_method.label: Costing Method
property_cost_method.help_text:
Standard Price: The products are valued at their standard cost defined on the product.
        Average Cost (AVCO): The products are valued at weighted average cost.
        First In First Out (FIFO): The products are valued supposing those that enter the company first will also leave it first.

property_stock_journal.name: property_stock_journal
property_stock_journal.label: Stock Journal
property_stock_journal.help_text: When doing automated inventory valuation, this is the Accounting Journal in which entries will be automatically posted when stock moves are processed.

property_stock_account_input_categ_id.name: property_stock_account_input_categ_id
property_stock_account_input_categ_id.label: Stock Input Account
property_stock_account_input_categ_id.help_text:
Counterpart journal items for all incoming stock moves will be posted in this account, unless there is a specific valuation account
                set on the source location. This is the default value for all products in this category. It can also directly be set on each product.

property_stock_account_output_categ_id.name: property_stock_account_output_categ_id
property_stock_account_output_categ_id.label: Stock Output Account
property_stock_account_output_categ_id.help_text:
When doing automated inventory valuation, counterpart journal items for all outgoing stock moves will be posted in this account,
                unless there is a specific valuation account set on the destination location. This is the default value for all products in this category.
                It can also directly be set on each product.

property_stock_valuation_account_id.name: property_stock_valuation_account_id
property_stock_valuation_account_id.label: Stock Valuation Account
property_stock_valuation_account_id.help_text: When automated inventory valuation is enabled on a product, this account will hold the current value of the products.

property_account_creditor_price_differen.name: property_account_creditor_price_difference_categ
property_account_creditor_price_differen.label: Price Difference Account
property_account_creditor_price_differen.help_text: This account will be used to value price difference between purchase price and accounting cost.

activity_state.name: activity_state
activity_state.label: Activity State
activity_state.help_text:
Status based on activities
Overdue: Due date is already passed
Today: Activity date is today
Planned: Future activities.

activity_exception_decoration.name: activity_exception_decoration
activity_exception_decoration.label: Activity Exception Decoration
activity_exception_decoration.help_text: Type of the exception activity on record.

activity_exception_icon.name: activity_exception_icon
activity_exception_icon.label: Icon
activity_exception_icon.help_text: Icon to indicate an exception activity.

message_needaction.name: message_needaction
message_needaction.label: Action Needed
message_needaction.help_text: If checked, new messages require your attention.

message_has_error.name: message_has_error
message_has_error.label: Message Delivery error
message_has_error.help_text: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

message_has_error_counter.name: message_has_error_counter
message_has_error_counter.label: Number of errors
message_has_error_counter.help_text: Number of messages with delivery error

message_has_sms_error.name: message_has_sms_error
message_has_sms_error.label: SMS Delivery error
message_has_sms_error.help_text: If checked, some messages have a delivery error.

sequence.name: sequence
sequence.label: Sequence
sequence.help_text: Gives the sequence order when displaying a product list

description_sale.name: description_sale
description_sale.label: Sales Description
description_sale.help_text: A description of the Product that you want to communicate to your customers. This description will be copied to every Sales Order, Delivery Order and Customer Invoice/Credit Note

detailed_type.name: detailed_type
detailed_type.label: Product Type
detailed_type.help_text:
A storable product is a product for which you manage stock. The Inventory app has to be installed.
A consumable product is a product for which stock is not managed.
A service is a non-material product you provide.

list_price.name: list_price
list_price.label: Sales Price
list_price.help_text: Price at which the product is sold to customers.

standard_price.name: standard_price
standard_price.label: Cost
standard_price.help_text:
In Standard Price & AVCO: value of the product (automatically computed in AVCO).
        In FIFO: value of the next unit that will leave the stock (automatically computed).
        Used to value the product when the purchase cost is not known (e.g. inventory adjustment).
        Used to compute margins on sale orders.

uom_id.name: uom_id
uom_id.label: Unit of Measure
uom_id.help_text: Default unit of measure used for all stock operations.

uom_po_id.name: uom_po_id
uom_po_id.label: Purchase UoM
uom_po_id.help_text: Default unit of measure used for purchase orders. It must be in the same category as the default unit of measure.

packaging_ids.name: packaging_ids
packaging_ids.label: Product Packages
packaging_ids.help_text: Gives the different ways to package the same product.

active.name: active
active.label: Active
active.help_text: If unchecked, it will allow you to hide the product without removing it.

taxes_id.name: taxes_id
taxes_id.label: Customer Taxes
taxes_id.help_text: Default taxes used when selling the product.

supplier_taxes_id.name: supplier_taxes_id
supplier_taxes_id.label: Vendor Taxes
supplier_taxes_id.help_text: Default taxes used when buying the product.

property_account_income_id.name: property_account_income_id
property_account_income_id.label: Income Account
property_account_income_id.help_text: Keep this field empty to use the default value from the product category.

property_account_expense_id.name: property_account_expense_id
property_account_expense_id.label: Expense Account
property_account_expense_id.help_text: Keep this field empty to use the default value from the product category. If anglo-saxon accounting with automated valuation method is configured, the expense account on the product category will be used.

account_tag_ids.name: account_tag_ids
account_tag_ids.label: Account Tags
account_tag_ids.help_text: Tags to be set on the base and tax journal items created for this product.

responsible_id.name: responsible_id
responsible_id.label: Responsible
responsible_id.help_text: This user will be responsible of the next activities related to logistic operations for this product.

property_stock_production.name: property_stock_production
property_stock_production.label: Production Location
property_stock_production.help_text: This stock location will be used, instead of the default one, as the source location for stock moves generated by manufacturing orders.

property_stock_inventory.name: property_stock_inventory
property_stock_inventory.label: Inventory Location
property_stock_inventory.help_text: This stock location will be used, instead of the default one, as the source location for stock moves generated when you do an inventory.

sale_delay.name: sale_delay
sale_delay.label: Customer Lead Time
sale_delay.help_text: Delivery lead time, in days. It's the number of days, promised to the customer, between the confirmation of the sales order and the delivery.

tracking.name: tracking
tracking.label: Tracking
tracking.help_text: Ensure the traceability of a storable product in your warehouse.

has_available_route_ids.name: has_available_route_ids
has_available_route_ids.label: Routes can be selected on this product

route_ids.name: route_ids
route_ids.label: Routes
route_ids.help_text: Depending on the modules installed, this will allow you to define the route of the product: whether it will be bought, manufactured, replenished on order, etc.

nbr_moves_in.label: Nbr Moves In
nbr_moves_in.help_text: Number of incoming stock moves in the past 12 months

nbr_moves_out.name: nbr_moves_out
nbr_moves_out.label: Nbr Moves Out
nbr_moves_out.help_text: Number of outgoing stock moves in the past 12 months

show_on_hand_qty_status_button.name: show_on_hand_qty_status_button
show_on_hand_qty_status_button.label: Show On Hand Qty Status Button

use_expiration_date.label: Use Expiration Date
use_expiration_date.help_text: When this box is ticked, you have the possibility to specify dates to manage product expiration, on the product and on the corresponding lot/serial numbers

expiration_time.name: expiration_time
expiration_time.label: Expiration Date
expiration_time.help_text: Number of days after the receipt of the products (from the vendor or in stock after production) after which the goods may become dangerous and must not be consumed. It will be computed on the lot/serial number.

use_time.name: use_time
use_time.label: Best Before Date

alert_time.name: alert_time

purchase_method.help_text:
On ordered quantities: Control bills based on ordered quantities.
On received quantities: Control bills based on received quantities.

purchase_line_warn.help_text: Selecting the "Warning" option will notify user with the message, Selecting "Blocking Message" will throw an exception with the message and block the flow. The Message has to be written in the next field.

        Average Cost (AVCO): The products are valued at weighted average cost.

pos_categ_id.label: Point of Sale Category
pos_categ_id.help_text: Category used in the Point of Sale.

service_type.help_text:
Manually set quantities on order: Invoice based on the manually entered quantity, without creating an analytic account.
Timesheets on contract: Invoice based on the tracked hours on the related timesheet.

sale_line_warn.help_text: Selecting the "Warning" option will notify user with the message, Selecting "Blocking Message" will throw an exception with the message and block the flow. The Message has to be written in the next field.

expense_policy.name: expense_policy
expense_policy.label: Re-Invoice Expenses
expense_policy.help_text: Expenses and vendor bills can be re-invoiced to a customer.With this option, a validated expense can be re-invoice to a customer at its cost or sales price.

invoice_policy.name: invoice_policy
invoice_policy.label: Invoicing Policy
invoice_policy.help_text:
Ordered Quantity: Invoice quantities ordered by the customer.
Delivered Quantity: Invoice quantities delivered to the customer.

property_account_creditor_price_differen.name: property_account_creditor_price_difference
property_account_creditor_price_differen.label: Price Difference Account
property_account_creditor_price_differen.help_text: This account is used in automated inventory valuation to record the price difference between a purchase order and its related vendor bill when validating this vendor bill.

optional_product_ids.name: optional_product_ids
optional_product_ids.label: Optional Products
optional_product_ids.help_text: Optional Products are suggested whenever the customer hits *Add to Cart* (cross-sell strategy, e.g. for computers: warranty, software, etc.).

service_to_purchase.name: service_to_purchase
service_to_purchase.label: Subcontract Service
service_to_purchase.help_text: If ticked, each time you sell this product through a SO, a RfQ is automatically created to buy the product. Tip: don't forget to set a vendor on the product.

landed_cost_ok.name: landed_cost_ok
landed_cost_ok.label: Is a Landed Cost
landed_cost_ok.help_text: Indicates whether the product is a landed cost: when receiving a vendor bill, you can allocate this cost on preceding receipts.

split_method_landed_cost.name: split_method_landed_cost
split_method_landed_cost.label: Default Split Method
split_method_landed_cost.help_text: Default Split Method when used for Landed Cost
